actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific

official_title: Calling for a restoration of civil government in Thailand established by fair, free, democratic, and open elections and expressing solidarity with the people of Thailand in their desire for democracy.
subjects: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text:
Calls for a restoration of civil government in Thailand established by democratic and open elections.

 Expresses solidarity with the people of Thailand in their desire for democracy.
